content: तुल् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (तोलति-तोलयति-ते; also तुलयति-ते which some suppose to be a denominative from तुला) {@--1@} To weigh, measure. {@--2@} To weigh in the mind, ponder, consider. {@--3@} To raise, lift up; कैलासे तुलिते <ls>Mv. 5. 37</ls>; पौलस्त्यतुलितस्याद्रेरादधान इव थियं <ls>R. 4. 80</ls>, <ls n="R.">12. 89</ls>; <ls>Śi. 15. 30.</ls> {@--4@} To bear up, hold up, support; पृथिवीतले तुलितभूभृदुच्यसे <ls>Śi. 15. 30</ls>, <ls n="Śi. 15.">61.</ls> {@--5@} To compare, equal, liken (with <ab>instr.</ab>); तृणमिव तुलयंति <ls>Pt. 5. 31</ls>; मुखं श्लेष्मागारं तदपि च शशांकेन तुलितं <ls>Bh. 3. 20</ls>; <ls>Śi. 8. 12.</ls> {@--6@} To match, be equal to (with <ab>acc.</ab>); प्रासादास्त्वां तुलयितुमलं यत्र तैस्तैर्विशेषैः <ls>Me. 64.</ls> {@--7@} To make light of, contemn, despise; अंतःसारं घन तुलयितुं नानिलः शक्ष्यति त्वां <ls>Me. 20</ls> (where तु. also means ‘to bear up or carry away’); <ls>Śi. 15. 30.</ls> {@--8@} To suspect, examine with distrust; कः श्रद्धास्यति भूतार्थं सर्वो मां तुलयिष्यति <ls>Mk. 3. 24</ls>, <ls n="Mk.">5. 43</ls> (where some editions read तूलयिष्यति for तुलयिष्यति). {@--9@} To try, put to test, reduce to a wretched state; हा अवस्थे तुलयसि <ls>Mk. 1</ls> (तूलयसि <ab>v. l.</ab>). {@--10@} To counterbalance, outweigh. {@--11@} To have in the same degree, attain or reach to.
